item.title: Behind
item.author: me@fishlasers.co.uk (Fish Lasers)
item.description:
Last month I was interviewed by the wonderful Julia Males for The Isis Magazine - it can be found here:

THE BONES AND GUTS ARE ON DISPLAY”: BEHIND THE SOUND AND STAGE DESIGN OF THE TEMPEST

item.title: The Tempest: Trailer
item.author: me@fishlasers.co.uk (Fish Lasers)
item.description:
This was a ridiculously exciting project to work on.

Trailer credits: Directed and edited by Faith Wong Director of Photography: Coco Cottam Sound Design: Alva Orr
